name: Gusanito Joe
description:
"Be Green, Be Cool"

GAME FEATURES:

-Easy to play

-Retro Nostalgic

-9 STAGES

-Variety of game characters/items/mechanics

-Infinite replayability

-NES pixel art style

-This game can be finished while you are in a boring meeting (10 min) 

CONTROLLERS AVAILABLE: Keyboard, Xbox Controller (Mac/Windows)

CONTROLS:

Move (x, y): A, D, W, S. Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow. Left Joystick

ESC: Quit the game

START: Enter, Space, A/B button on Xbox controller, 

SPACE: Restart Level in gameplay
